```{r, echo =FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

#Sammenligning af diabetes +% neuropati

load(here::here("data/diabrisk.rda"))

library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
library(kableExtra)
library(flextable)

diabrisk$activity <- factor(diabrisk$activity,
                                levels = c(0,1,2,3),
                                labels = c("0 hrs/week", "1-3 hrs/week", "4-7 hrs/week", ">7 hrs/week"))


diabrisk$smoking <- factor(diabrisk$smoking,
                               levels = c(0,1,2,3),
                               labels = c("Never", "Previous", "Smoke", "NI"))

diabrisk$alcohol <- factor(diabrisk$alcohol,
                               levels = c(0,1,2,3,4),
                               labels = c("0 unit/week", "1-3 units/week", "4-7 units/week", "8-14 units/week", ">15 units/week"))


diabrisk$DSPN_dia <- factor(diabrisk$DSPN_dia,
                               levels = c(1,2),
                               labels = c("No neuropathy", "Neuropathy"))

riskfactor_diab <- rename(diabrisk, Age = age, HbA1c = hba1c, "HbA1c mean 5 yrs" = hba1c_mean5yrs, "Total daily insulin"=total_daily_insulin, "Time in range"=TIR, "Diabetes duration" = DD, "SBP" = sysBT, "DBP" = diaBT, Retinopathy = retinopathy, Nephropathy = nephropathy, Smoking = smoking, Alcohol = alcohol, Activity = activity, Pulse = pulse, Diabetes = diabetes,  "Tanner" = tanner, "Hip circumference" = hip, "Waist circumference" = waist, Cholesterol = cholesterol, Triglycerids = triglycerids, "Diabetes and neuropathy status"=DSPN_dia, "Gender (female)" = gender, "Basal insulin" = basal_insulin, "Time in hypoglycemia" = time_hypo)


riskfactor_diab %>% 
    select("Diabetes and neuropathy status", "Gender (female)", Age, "Diabetes duration", HbA1c, "HbA1c mean 5 yrs", "Time in range", "Time in hypoglycemia", "Basal insulin", "Total daily insulin", BMI, "Hip circumference", "Waist circumference", Tanner, SBP, DBP, Pulse, Retinopathy, Nephropathy, Cholesterol, LDL, HDL, Triglycerids, Alcohol, Smoking, Activity) %>% 
    tbl_summary(by = "Diabetes and neuropathy status", missing = "no", statistic = list(all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})"), type = list("Gender (female)" ~ "dichotomous"), value = list("Gender (female)" ~ "female")) %>%
    add_p() %>% 
    modify_header(label ~ "**Variable**") %>% 
     modify_caption("Table 1. Charateristics of participants with diabetes stratified by neuropathy status") %>% 
    modify_footnote(update=all_stat_cols() ~ "Mean (SD) for continous; n (%) for categorical") %>%
    as_flex_table() %>% 
    footnote(i=1,j=1,part = "header", value = as_paragraph("Abbreviations: HbA1c, Hemoglobin a1c; BMI, body-mass index; SBP, systolic blood pressure; DBP, diastolic blood pressure; HDL, high density lipoproteins; LDL, low density lipoproteins; NI, not indicated"), ref_symbols = "") %>% 
    theme_zebra(odd_header = "transparent") %>% 
    fontsize(size= 6 , part = "footer") %>% 
    bold(bold = FALSE, part = "footer") %>% 
    fontsize(size=8, part = "header") %>% 
    fontsize(size=8, part = "body") %>% 
    line_spacing(space = 0.3, part = "body") %>% 
    line_spacing(space = 1, part = "footer") %>% 
    autofit(add_w = 0, add_h = 0)

```
